headline: Why Analysts See the Warner Bros. Discovery Story Shifting as Bids and Breakup Talk Escalate
summary: Warner Bros. Discovery’s fair value estimate has been nudged higher from $22.47 to $24.10 per share as analysts increasingly price in potential strategic deals and asset sales, even as revenue growth assumptions are dialed back from roughly 0.77% to 0.26% to reflect a more cautious fundamental outlook. A slightly lower discount rate of 10.55%, down from 10.88%, captures the market’s rising confidence that a transaction, strategic review, or breakup could unlock value more quickly than a slow...
